hero.title: Effortless Bill Splitting, Simplified & Smart.
hero.subtitle: Say goodbye to awkward IOUs and complex calculations. Our app makes sharing expenses with friends, family, and roommates easy, fair, and transparent.
hero.highlight: It's 100% free, with no ads and no limits.
hero.focusMessage: Focus on what matters, not on the math.

features.sectionTitle: Everything You Need, Nothing You Don't

smartGroupManagement.title: Smart Group Management
smartGroupManagement.description: Create groups for any occasion. Easily add members and track shared expenses in one place, keeping everyone on the same page.

flexibleSplitting.title: Flexible Splitting
flexibleSplitting.description: Split bills equally, by exact amounts, or by percentages. We handle all the complex math, so you don't have to.

debtSimplification.title: Debt Simplification
debtSimplification.description: Our algorithm minimizes transactions, showing you the simplest way to settle up, saving everyone time and hassle.

freeToUse.title: 100% Free to Use
freeToUse.description: Our service is and always will be free. No hidden fees or premium tiers—just a powerful, accessible tool for everyone.

unlimitedUse.title: Unlimited Use
unlimitedUse.description: Create as many groups, add as many friends, and track as many expenses as you need. No restrictions, no limits.

noAds.title: Zero Ads, Ever
noAds.description: Enjoy a clean, focused experience. We will never sell your data or clutter your screen with ads. Your privacy is our priority.

pricing.subtitle: Choose Your Adventure

starter.title: The "Just Getting Started" Plan
features: Unlimited friends (if you have that many)
Access to our highly sarcastic FAQ section

pro.title: The "I'm Basically a Pro" Plan
features: Advanced debt simplification (it's the same, but sounds cooler)
Priority access to our "we'll get to it when we get to it" support
The warm fuzzy feeling of not paying for anything
Bragging rights to your friends about your free app

philanthropist.title: The "I'm a Philanthropist" Plan
features: The ability to tell people you're on the "Philanthropist" plan
A deep sense of satisfaction from using a free app
We'll send you good vibes (results may vary)
Your name will be whispered in the halls of free software fame
